mapper.select: SELECT LOG.ID, LOG.CREATEDDATETIME , LOG.LOGRESULT , LOG.REPORTNAME, LOG.SEARCHPATH , LOG.SENDER , LOG.REPORTID, COUNT(LOG_DTL.ID) DTLCOUNT FROM T_CM_TIME_TASK_LOG log LEFT JOIN T_CM_TIME_TASK_LOG_DTL LOG_DTL ON LOG_DTL.LOGID=LOG.ID where reportid =#{reportid} GROUP BY LOG.ID , LOG.CREATEDDATETIME, LOG.LOGRESULT, LOG.REPORTNAME, LOG.SEARCHPATH, LOG.SENDER, LOG.REPORTID order by LOG.CREATEDDATETIME desc
select count(1) from T_CM_TIME_TASK_LOG where reportid =#{reportid}
select count(1) from T_CM_TIME_TASK_LOG_DTL where logid =#{logid}
select * from T_CM_TIME_TASK_LOG_DTL where logid =#{logid} order by EMAIL
select * from T_CM_TIME_TASK order by createddatetime desc

select * from T_CM_TIME_TASK where 1=1
AND ID =#{ID}
